timeline.message:
Merge branch 'DROOLS-5493' into DROOLS-5492

# Conflicts:
#	pom.xml
[DROOLS-5493] Updating tests. Begin removal of "first citizen/next citizen" differentiation
[DROOLS-5493] Declaring PMMLRuntime as public static field
[KOGITO-2752] generate executable model sources in pmml codegen

Merge pull request #1 from mariofusco/k2752

[KOGITO-2752] generate executable model sources in pmml codegen
[DROOLS-5491] Working DMN+PMML with Regression and Tree PMML models
[DROOLS-5491] Working status for both drools and not-drools PMMLS, Rest implementation and direct PMML invocation
[DROOLS-5491] Add integration tests. BusinessRuleTaskTest.testDecision() test broken

Merge remote-tracking branch 'origin/master' into DROOLS-5491

# Conflicts:
#	kogito-codegen/src/main/java/org/kie/kogito/codegen/ConfigGenerator.java
#	kogito-codegen/src/main/resources/class-templates/config/ApplicationConfigTemplate.java
#	kogito-codegen/src/test/java/org/kie/kogito/codegen/AbstractCodegenTest.java
#	kogito-quarkus-extension/deployment/src/main/java/org/kie/kogito/quarkus/deployment/KogitoAssetsProcessor.java
#	pom.xml

replies.bodyText:
I would prefer to keep it here.
Spreading code here and there makes maintenance pretty hard.
replies.author: gitgabrio

timeline.bodyText: What about make PMMLRuntimeBuilder accept a Stream as parameter so that you can avoid to iterate over the list twice?
timeline.author: danielezonca

timeline.bodyText: Can you please add the number of models found in the message? I would suggest to update the message too because you can find 0 models so probably Wrong number of models... is more accurate
timeline.author: danielezonca

timeline.bodyText: Is this a constant? If so can you please move it to a static field?
timeline.author: danielezonca

replies.bodyText:
@danielezonca
It is not a constant. It is a left-over from legacy implementation and I still have to find a clean way to use/generate it.
replies.author: gitgabrio

timeline.bodyText: In a future ticket I would consider to move these methods to PMMLRuntimeBuilder and make PMMLAssembler use them instead of the opposite so that we will have this PMMLRuntimeBuilder as single entry point for both. Wdyt?
timeline.author: danielezonca

replies.bodyText: This would make sense only if/when there would a PMML module implemented outside any "container" - so that common code (e.g. PMMLRuntimeBuilder) could be referred to by both containers (Drools/Kogito) without having one of them depending on the other.
replies.author: gitgabrio

timeline.bodyText: To be removed?
timeline.author: danielezonca

timeline.bodyText: Is it a constant? If so can you please move it to a static field?
timeline.author: danielezonca

timeline.bodyText: To be removed fixed/removed before merging (or at least create a ticket to track this)
timeline.author: danielezonca

timeline.bodyText: STRONGLY_TYPED_CONFIGURATION_KEY is a DMN specific configuration to enable bean generation and replace Map<String, Object> as input. Does PMML have something similar? I think it can be removed
timeline.author: danielezonca

timeline.bodyText: I think we can remove strongly typed here (as comment above)
timeline.author: danielezonca

timeline.bodyText: To be removed?
timeline.author: danielezonca

timeline.bodyText: Side note for another ticket: I think it could be nice to move this class to a -api module instead of -commons. Wdyt?
timeline.author: danielezonca

timeline.message: [DROOLS-5491] Working PMML and DMN+PMML. Replaced PMMLRuntime propagation with Function kiePMMLRuntimeFactoryFunction
[DROOLS-5491] Fixing pom. Fixing package name for PMML rest

Merge branch 'master' into DROOLS-5491

# Conflicts:
#	pom.xml

Merge remote-tracking branch 'origin/master' into DROOLS-5491

# Conflicts:
#	drools/kogito-dmn/src/main/java/org/kie/kogito/dmn/DMNKogito.java

timeline.bodyText: Can you please create a ticket to improve the test and remove this hack?
timeline.author: danielezonca

timeline.bodyText: I don't think iff was a typo and it should be intended as if and only if
timeline.author: danielezonca
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -64,13 +64,16 @@
     // codegen backend only if at least one file of the given type exist
 
     @Parameter(property = "kogito.codegen.rules", defaultValue = "")
-    private String generateRules; // defaults to true iff there exist DRL files
+    private String generateRules; // defaults to true if there exist DRL files
 
     @Parameter(property = "kogito.codegen.processes", defaultValue = "")
-    private String generateProcesses; // defaults to true iff there exist BPMN files
+    private String generateProcesses; // defaults to true if there exist BPMN files
 
     @Parameter(property = "kogito.codegen.decisions", defaultValue = "")
-    private String generateDecisions; // defaults to true iff there exist DMN files
+    private String generateDecisions; // defaults to true if there exist DMN files
+
+    @Parameter(property = "kogito.codegen.predictions", defaultValue = "")
+    private String generatePredictions; // defaults to true if there exist PMML files

timeline.bodyText: Same as above
timeline.author: danielezonca

timeline.bodyText: What is the reason of this change?
timeline.author: danielezonca

replies.bodyText:
If you look the original code - and the invoked method - they both expected a file to be a "jar" file, which is not verified anywhere. An artifact may contain a "pom" file, and in such situation the snippet:
private static KieModuleModel getDependencyKieModel(final File jar) throws IOException {
         ZipFile zipFile = new ZipFile(jar)
throws an Excpetion.
Similar modification has been proposed inside Drools too.
replies.author: gitgabrio

timeline.message: [DROOLS-5491] Fixed as per PR reviews. Minor refactoring

timeline.bodyText:
@gitgabrio @danielezonca I have stumbled upon this when trying to upgrade kogito to the latest snapshot in optaplanner.
Does it mean that if I declare a dependency on org.kie.kogito:drools-core, which depends on drools-core-static, I have to declare also a runtime dependency on org.kie:kie-pmml-evaluator-core (or rather org.kie.kogito:kogito-pmml)?
timeline.author: rsynek
